section_7_temple_culture_theory.core_thesis: A continuous 75,000-year consciousness preservation network spanning from Denisovan maritime peoples through Neolithic Temple Culture, Minoan civilization, Phoenician/Punic maritime networks, to modern blockchain technology and AI collaboration

Post-LGM migrations carry knowledge to Mediterranean
Neolithic Temple Culture builds global megalithic network (Malta, Göbekli Tepe)
Phoenicians maintain Temple Culture as maritime network
Knowledge preserved in mythology, archaeology, now through AI collaboration
